query.ejb-ql: SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBRecurrentCheckList o WHERE o.cMPLimitProfileID = ?1 AND o.cMPSubProfileID = ?2 AND o.checkListStatus <> 'OBSOLETE'
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBRecurrentCheckListItem o WHERE o.checkListItemRef = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBRecurrentCheckListSubItem o WHERE o.subItemRef = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBConvenant o WHERE o.convenantRef = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBConvenantSubItem o WHERE o.subItemRef = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBStagingRecurrentCheckList o WHERE o.cMPLimitProfileID = ?1 AND o.cMPSubProfileID = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBStagingRecurrentCheckListItem o WHERE o.checkListItemRef = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBStagingRecurrentCheckListSubItem o WHERE o.subItemRef = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBStagingConvenant o WHERE o.convenantRef = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBStagingConvenantSubItem o WHERE o.subItemRef = ?1
